 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂטָן‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ps.109.6|Ps 109:6]]</sup> 

**1.** ==adversary==. 

**2.** ==Satan== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂטָן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָטָן‎</span>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׂטָנָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָטָנָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (Hebrew); Late Hebrew verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָטַן‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְטַן‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be remote***, especially from the truth, and from the mercy of God; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***Satan***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">:); — 

**1.** ***adversary***, in general, personal or national; (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָיָה לְשׂ‎</span> [[Num.22.22|Num 22:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.29.4|1Sam 29:4]] (compare [[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>Marg. 15</sup>), [[2Sam.19.23|2Sam 19:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצָא לְשׂ‎</span> [[Num.22.32|Num 22:32]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[1Kgs.5.18|1Kgs 5:18]]; [[1Kgs.11.25|1Kgs 11:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵקִים שׂ‎</span>, subject God [[1Kgs.11.14|1Kgs 11:14]]; [[1Kgs.11.23|1Kgs 11:23]], compare [[Ps.109.6|Ps 109:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָשָׁע‎</span>). 

**2.** ***superhuman adversary***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׂ‎</span>: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of Job, one of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי אֱלֹהִים‎</span> [[Job.1.6|Job 1:6]]; [[Job.1.7|Job 1:7]] (twice in verse); [[Job.1.8|Job 1:8]]; [[Job.1.9|Job 1:9]]; [[Job.1.12|Job 1:12]] (twice in verse); [[Job.2.1|Job 2:1]]; [[Job.2.2|Job 2:2]] (twice in verse); [[Job.2.3|Job 2:3]]; [[Job.2.4|Job 2:4]] (twice in verse); [[Job.2.6|Job 2:6]]; [[Job.2.7|Job 2:7]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of high priest of Israel before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Zech.3.1|Zech 3:1]]; [[Zech.3.2|Zech 3:2]] (twice in verse); [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὁ διάβολος</span>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** as proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> ***Satan*** [[1Chr.21.1|1Chr 21:1]] (interpret [[2Sam.24.1|2Sam 24:1]]), [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">διάβολος</span> ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">σατάν</span> [[1Kgs.11.14|1Kgs 11:14]]; [[1Kgs.11.23|1Kgs 11:23]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σατανᾶς</span> [[Matt.4.10|Matt 4:10]]; [[Mark.1.13|Mark 1:13]]; [[Luke.10.18|Luke 10:18]] + 33 t. NT).
